statements: SELECT * FROM driver_schedule WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM driver_schedule WHERE performance_metric > 80;
SELECT driver_id, shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time, performance_metric FROM driver_schedule WHERE shift_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT driver_id, performance_metric FROM driver_schedule ORDER BY performance_metric DESC;
SELECT * FROM driver_schedule WHERE shift_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT * FROM driver_schedule WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM driver_schedule WHERE driver_id = 2;
SELECT driver_id, shift_date, performance_metric FROM driver_schedule WHERE performance_metric > 80;
SELECT * FROM driver_schedule WHERE shift_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT driver_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM driver_schedule ORDER BY shift_date DESC, shift_start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM driver_schedules;
SELECT driver_id, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM driver_schedules WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT start_time, end_time FROM driver_schedules WHERE shift_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT id, driver_id, efficiency_percentage FROM performance_metrics WHERE completed_tasks > 10;
SELECT driver_id, SUM(completed_tasks) AS total_tasks_completed FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY driver_id ORDER BY total_tasks_completed DESC;
SELECT * FROM driver_schedules ORDER BY shift_date DESC, start_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT driver_id, COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM driver_schedules GROUP BY driver_id HAVING total_shifts > 2 ORDER BY total_shifts DESC;
SELECT driver_id, SUM(completed_tasks) AS total_tasks_completed FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY driver_id ORDER BY total_tasks_completed DESC;
SELECT driver_id, AVG(efficiency_percentage) AS avg_efficiency FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY driver_id HAVING avg_efficiency > 80 ORDER BY avg_efficiency DESC;
SELECT driver_id, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM driver_schedules WHERE shift_date >= '2022-01-01' AND shift_date <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY shift_date ASC, start_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM driver_schedules;
SELECT driver_id, schedule_date FROM driver_schedules WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM shifts ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT shift_id, driver_id, shift_type FROM shifts WHERE shift_type = 'Morning';
SELECT driver_id, shift_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM driver_schedules WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM driver_schedules WHERE schedule_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE shift_type = 'Morning';
SELECT driver_id, shift_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 80;
SELECT driver_id, start_date, end_date, shift_type FROM driver_schedules JOIN shifts ON driver_schedules.driver_id = shifts.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM driver_schedules;
SELECT shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM driver_schedules WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE shift_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT driver_id, shift_date, shift_type FROM shifts ORDER BY shift_date DESC;
SELECT driver_id, AVG(productivity_score) AS avg_productivity_score FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY driver_id;
SELECT * FROM driver_schedules;
SELECT driver_id, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM driver_schedules ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT driver_id, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM driver_schedules WHERE driver_id = 3;
SELECT shift_type, COUNT(*) FROM shifts GROUP BY shift_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT driver_id, AVG(productivity_score) AS avg_productivity_score FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY driver_id ORDER BY avg_productivity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM driver_schedules WHERE schedule_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT driver_id, schedule_date, shift_start_time FROM driver_schedules WHERE driver_id = 1001;
SELECT shift_id, shift_type, shift_date FROM shifts ORDER BY shift_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT driver_id, metric_type, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_type = 'Efficiency' AND metric_value > 90;
SELECT transport_id, driver_id, transport_type, transport_date FROM transportation WHERE transport_type = 'Bus' ORDER BY transport_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM driver_schedules WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT driver_id, schedule_date FROM driver_schedules WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM shifts ORDER BY shift_date DESC, shift_type ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT shift_type FROM shifts WHERE driver_id = 2;
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value, metric_type FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY metric_type;
